snippet: The police in South Africa said they arrested a 25-year-old man who had swallowed the diamonds, worth $2.3 million, when he attempted to smuggle them out of the country.
abstract: South African police arrest 25-year-old man who swallowed 220 polished diamonds in effort to smuggle them out of country.
lead_paragraph: The police in South Africa said they arrested a 25-year-old man who had swallowed the diamonds, worth $2.3 million, when he attempted to smuggle them out of the country.

headline.seo: Man Who Swallowed 220 Diamonds Arrested in South Africa
headline.main: Man Who Swallowed 220 Diamonds Arrested in South Africa
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Police Arrest Man Who Swallowed 220 Diamonds
